title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department higher education research innovation science) order 2025

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: Jim O’Brien, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. 

Jim O’Brien, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to Marian Harkin, 
Minister of State at the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science, with effect from 25 February 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

17 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [285] 3
